for a filibuster to continue. To do so, he has introduced a resolution to change the rules of the Senate. "The minority must always maintain the right to continue debate," said Sen. Bernie Sanders Al Franken . But if the minority feels that strongly about an issue it should be their burden to continue that debate, not a supermajority's to end it. The change could return the Senate to the era of when filibusters were rare because Senators who wanted to continue the filibuster had to show up and stay on the floor of the Senate.
